actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to declare the sense of the Congress regarding treaty termination.

summary.text: Requires congressional approval or the advice and consent of the Senate before the United States terminates or withdraws from military alliance treaties, defense treaties, or national security treaties. Directs the President to report to the Speaker of the House and the Chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee whenever the President notifies any foreign entity that the United States intends to terminate or withdraw from a treaty or whenever the President determines that a treaty has lapsed or that operation of a treaty is suspended with respect to the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to declare the sense of the Congress regarding treaty termination.
